section.title: ITM_RXBUFFER_EMPTY
section.para: value identifying ITM_RxBuffer is ready for next character

section.title: AIRCR
section.para: Offset: 0x00C (R/W) Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

section.title: CTRL
section.para: Offset: 0x000 (R/W) SysTick Control and Status Register

section.title: DCRDR
section.para: Offset: 0x008 (R/W) Debug Core Register Data Register

section.title: DCRSR
section.para: Offset: 0x004 ( /W) Debug Core Register Selector Register

section.title: DEMCR
section.para: Offset: 0x00C (R/W) Debug Exception and Monitor Control Register

section.title: DHCSR
section.para: Offset: 0x000 (R/W) Debug Halting Control and Status Register

section.title: GE[1/4]
section.para: bit: 16..19 Greater than or Equal flags

section.title: GE[2/4]
section.para: bit: 16..19 Greater than or Equal flags

section.title: GE[3/4]
section.para: bit: 16..19 Greater than or Equal flags

section.title: GE[4/4]
section.para: bit: 16..19 Greater than or Equal flags

section.title: ICSR
section.para: Offset: 0x004 (R/W) Interrupt Control and State Register

section.title: nPRIV[1/2]
section.para: bit: 0 Execution privilege in Thread mode

section.title: nPRIV[2/2]
section.para: bit: 0 Execution privilege in Thread mode

section.title: SHCSR
section.para: Offset: 0x024 (R/W) System Handler Control and State Register
